The quote attributed to former US Secret: James Mattis, was not found in any news reports or official statements.
The infographic shared by Gautam Gambhir: who has a history of spreading misinformation.
A reverse: search of the infographic led to a Facebook page that clarified the quote was not an official statement by Mattis.
President Donald Trump: s recent endorsement of a ban on burning the American flag suggests that such a law does not currently exist in the US.
